page.title: 10HOME FARM.
page.content: {Home Farm:}The Farm was built about 25 years ago.The main Barn was built about 20 years ago and an old Shed built with the Farm.The Farm was originally made for the Farm up the road(this was the original Home Farm).The Mogfords bought the cottage off Mr.Cork who lives in the original Farm.Home Farm is mainly used as a base for the owners The Farm has 2 calves,3 horses(one of which is a foal),4 dogs 2 cats and lots of hens(plus 1 cockeral).The Farm is used for grazing .The cost of an animal is a Cow Â£500_Â£600 and a calf Â£100_Â£200,hens Â£6 and cockerels Â£10.They have got a lot of machinery,(tractors,hay maker etc.) Their favourite aspect of farming is living in the country and their worst is bringing in the animals in winter.
